com.doerit.doerdb

Class DoerDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.doerit.doerdb.DoerDB

  • public class DoerDB
extends java.lang.Object
    DoerDB is the base class which wraps two DoerDatabases: Local and Remote DoerDatabase.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DoerDB(DBCredentialWrapper localDBCredentials, DBCredentialWrapper remoteDBCredentials)
      Constructs a DoerDB instance with CredentialWrappers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.sql.ResultSet executeLocalQuery(java.lang.String sqlQuery)
      Executes a MySQL Query in Local Database.
      void executeLocalUpdate(java.lang.String sqlQuery)
      Executes a MySQL Update type Query in Local Databases.
      java.sql.ResultSet executeRemoteQuery(java.lang.String sqlQuery)
      Executes a MySQL Query in Remote Database.
      void executeRemoteUpdate(java.lang.String sqlQuery)
      Executes a MySQL Update type Query in Remote Databases.
      DoerDatabase getLocalDatabase()
      Used to obtain Local DoerDatabase.
      DoerDatabase getRemoteDatabase()
      Used to obtain Remote DoerDatabase.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Following method handles CLI calls to the JAR.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DoerDB

        public DoerDB(DBCredentialWrapper localDBCredentials,
              DBCredentialWrapper remoteDBCredentials)
       throws java.sql.SQLException,
              InitializationFailureException,
              NotFoundException
        Constructs a DoerDB instance with CredentialWrappers.
        Parameters:
        localDBCredentials - DBCredentialWrapper wrapping the credentials for Local Database.
        remoteDBCredentials - DBCredentialWrapper wrapping the credentials for Remote Database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If any exception occurs while connecting to databases.
        InitializationFailureException - If database is invalid DoerDB.
        NotFoundException - If Meta Table / Sync Table / Any trigger(s) are not found in any of the given databases.

    • Method Detail

      • getLocalDatabase

        public DoerDatabase getLocalDatabase()
        Used to obtain Local DoerDatabase.
        Returns:
        DoerDatabase Local DoerDatabase.

      • getRemoteDatabase

        public DoerDatabase getRemoteDatabase()
        Used to obtain Remote DoerDatabase.
        Returns:
        DoerDatabase Remote DoerDatabase.

      • executeLocalQuery

        public java.sql.ResultSet executeLocalQuery(java.lang.String sqlQuery)
                                     throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                            InitializationFailureException
        Executes a MySQL Query in Local Database.
        Parameters:
        sqlQuery - The query to be executed on the databases.
        Returns:
        java.sql.ResultSet returned after executing the query on the databases.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If any exception occurs during the query execution.
        InitializationFailureException - If DoerDatabase Implementation failed to initialize.

      • executeRemoteQuery

        public java.sql.ResultSet executeRemoteQuery(java.lang.String sqlQuery)
                                      throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                             InitializationFailureException
        Executes a MySQL Query in Remote Database.
        Parameters:
        sqlQuery - The query to be executed on the databases.
        Returns:
        java.sql.ResultSet returned after executing the query on the databases.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If any exception occurs during the query execution.
        InitializationFailureException - If DoerDatabase Implementation failed to initialize.

      • executeLocalUpdate

        public void executeLocalUpdate(java.lang.String sqlQuery)
                        throws QueryParseException,
                               java.sql.SQLException,
                               NotFoundException,
                               InitializationFailureException
        Executes a MySQL Update type Query in Local Databases. Note: This is an attended query where it gets recorded in meta table.
        Parameters:
        sqlQuery - The update MySQL query to be executed on the databases.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If any exception occurs during the query execution.
        InitializationFailureException - If DoerDatabase Implementation failed to initialize.
        NotFoundException - If a table name is not found in the MySQL query.
        QueryParseException - If MySQL query is invalid.

      • executeRemoteUpdate

        public void executeRemoteUpdate(java.lang.String sqlQuery)
                         throws QueryParseException,
                                java.sql.SQLException,
                                NotFoundException,
                                InitializationFailureException
        Executes a MySQL Update type Query in Remote Databases. Note: This is an attended query where it gets recorded in meta table.
        Parameters:
        sqlQuery - The update MySQL query to be executed on the databases.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If any exception occurs during the query execution.
        InitializationFailureException - If DoerDatabase Implementation failed to initialize.
        NotFoundException - If a table name is not found in the MySQL query.
        QueryParseException - If MySQL query is invalid.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Following method handles CLI calls to the JAR.
        Parameters:
        args - Command line arguments.
